```{r setup, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(gganimate)

wind_turbine <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-10-27/wind-turbine.csv')
```

```{r eda}
p <- wind_turbine %>%
  mutate(commission_year = parse_number(commissioning_date)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(longitude, latitude, group = objectid)) +
  borders(regions = "Canada") +
  geom_point() +
  coord_map() +
  theme_map() +
  transition_reveal(along = commission_year,
                    range = c(1992, 2020)) +
  labs(title = "Year: {round(frame_along, 0)}")

animate(p, start_pause = 15, end_pause = 15)
```
